Title: The Insight of Tyr
Description:
Did ya see Szar Skeleth on your way in? It's that ruined tower to the northeast.

We've got a bit of a good news, bad news situation there. The good news is the stone's already been found. Bad news is it was found by the Sundered Flame, specifically a magic-using dracthyr named Makko. And they're using it to control gorlocs.

Did I mention the dracthyr's misuse of the stone drove them mad?

Well, good luck!
